input: Analyze live turbine data, adjust settings within safety constraints, monitor the results, and report performance improvements to optimize wind farm operations.

subtasks.input: Collect and analyze real-time turbine operational data to identify performance anomalies and optimization opportunities
Access and stream live operational metrics from turbine sensors and control systems, including temperature, pressure, rotational speed, and power output.
Process collected data using statistical models and machine learning algorithms to detect deviations from baseline performance and identify potential efficiency improvements.
Modify turbine settings within predefined safety thresholds to optimize energy output based on analytical findings
Compare current turbine parameters with predefined safety limits and optimization recommendations from analysis to determine required adjustments
Implement parameter adjustments calculated from analytical findings while maintaining compliance with safety threshold constraints
Continuously track adjusted turbine parameters and energy production metrics to validate optimization effectiveness
Compile comparative performance data and generate optimization impact reports for operational review
